component.name: Catalyst
component.summary: AI-powered todo app with Eisenhower Matrix

description.p: Catalyst is an intelligent task manager that transforms natural language into perfectly structured and prioritized tasks. Simply write down what's on your mind, and our advanced AI will instantly organize your tasks using the proven Eisenhower Matrix.

Key features include AI-powered task parsing, automatic prioritization using the Eisenhower method (Do, Schedule, Delegate, Eliminate), privacy-first design with local-first storage, and support for multiple AI providers including offline operation.
The app features a beautiful, minimalist interface with Material You theming that adapts to your system colors. It supports both light and dark modes.

screenshot.caption: Main application window showing the Eisenhower Matrix interface

description.p: Transform how you manage tasks with Catalyst, the intelligent todo app that understands natural language and prioritizes using the proven Eisenhower Matrix.
